card.name: Poisonous Mushroom
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put 1 card from your hand into your mana zone.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Kooc Pollon
card.text: ■ This creature can't be attacked.

card.name: Hearty Cap'n Polligon
card.text: ■ End Step

card.name: Gantora Maxivus
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Tensai Janit of the Hidden Blade
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Deepsea Searcher
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Taiga, the Warrior Savage
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker

card.name: Jasmine, Mist Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Dondon Vacuuming Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Titan Giant
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then return up to 2 creatures from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Prometheus, Splash Axe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Faerie Shower
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your mana zone.

card.name: Thunderbolt, Aqua Militant
card.text: ■ When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone and draw 2 cards instead. ■ If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, this creature gets +4000 power and "double breaker".

card.name: Johnny Walker, Exploding Mask
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, choose one of the following. :► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

card.name: Mega Blade Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have "blocker".

card.name: Completely Unidentified
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a card in their mana zone or whenever they use a card, skip the rest of the turn ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, after the attack, skip the rest of the turn

card.name: Scale of Bravery and Love
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Discard a card from your hand, then draw 2 cards. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

card.name: Blue Dragon Earth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a non-evolution creature in your mana zone that costs less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone. If it's a fire or nature creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

card.name: Toprasas, Rainbow Dash
card.text: ■ Each turn, you may have the first fire or nature creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Ruins of the Lion King
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Stepple, Cherry Blossom Wind Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ When this creature is destroyed, put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard.

card.name: Senno, Brainwash
card.text: ■ During your opponent's turn, they can't put creatures into the battle zone in any way except by summoning.

card.name: Onikamas, Strange Flow
card.text: ■ Your opponent Unchoosable ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature in a way except by summoning during their turn, you may return that creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Analith, Cyber Armor
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy it. If you do, choose one of the following. :► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. :► Draw a card.

card.name: Master of Duel
card.text: ■ Sympathy: Human, Outrage, Jokers ''(This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your Human, Outrage and/or Jokers creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less.)'' ■ Speed Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ Each turn, when this creature attacks for the first or second time, untap it.

card.name: Nikujiru Busher
card.text: ■ Instead of paying the cost, you may put one of your creatures, a shield, and a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck to summon this creature. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Brain's Coral Saint Tree
card.text: ■ Draw 3 cards. Then you may choose a water card in your hand that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand. If you do, use that card from your hand For No Cost

card.name: Minomi, Greedy Young Magician
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a spell from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Tyke Tysons
card.text: ■ Jokers Change ■ When this creature leaves, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Gagagan Jokers
card.text: ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Ryusei Five Sword Kaiser
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Mach Fighter ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, until the start of your next turn, you can't Prevents Defeat

card.text: ■ Buzzrender ■ Icon

card.name: Rolemodeltiger
card.text: ■ Buzzrender ■ File:Buzzrender2.png ■ Mach Fighter ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, they attack this creature if able.

card.name: Tsunekin ☆ Games
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Whenever your opponent would put a creature that costs more than the number of cards in their mana zone, put that creature into its owner's mana zone instead.
